name: Positive Light Liquid Luminizer Highlight
about: What it is:A silky, second-skin liquid highlighter that creates a lasting, soft, and luminous finish..Ingredient Callouts:Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Packed with light-reflecting pearl particles and a botanical blend of lotus, gardenia, and white waterlily, this multidimensional formula lends skin a dewy glow in seconds. Mix this weightless liquid highlighter with foundation or layer it across the high points of the face for instant radiance.
ingredients: Isododecane, Mica, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Unsaponifiables, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Octyldodecanol, Dimethicone, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera (Sacred Lotus) Flower Extract, Nymphaea Odorata Root Extract, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isostearic Acid, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tin Oxide, Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [+/- May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77499)].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Using the doe-foot applicator, apply one or two dots wherever you want to add a touch of glow: high points of cheeks, browbone, or bridge of nose.

reviews.review_text: I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador and a new Sephora employee.  A little goes a long way with this product. Once I pulled the wand out, I dabbed a little bit onto my hand and then tapped it onto the high points of my face. I didnt want to apply it directly to my face because there was a lot of product on the wand already. The color is a beautiful light pink champagne color that is easy to blend out. The glow wasnt overpowering for my light skin tone, more of a glow from within. I didnt notice any sparkles or it accentuating fine lines and wrinkles. I did set it with powder lightly and then added a powder highlighter on top. Overall, I really loved this product and think its worth it if you are looking for a new liquid highlighter.
